data.title: Obituary for WILLIAM GRAY
data.meta_description: Obituary for WILLIAM SHAW "BILL" GRAY | Bill Gray tipped his hat good-bye on Tuesday, June 2, 2015 at his home on the Gray Ranch near Orin Junction, Wyoming.  He left this life surrounded by his family.Bill was born July...
data.meta_site_name: Obituary for WILLIAM GRAY | June 2, 2015 | Gorman Funeral Homes
data.text:
Coping with Grief

We would like to offer our sincere support to anyone coping with grief. Enter your email below for our complimentary daily grief messages. Messages run for up to one year and you can stop at any time. Your email will not be used for any other purpose.
